paragraphs.text: Do you have what you need as a supervisor to effectively manage employee accommodation requests?

runs.text: Do you have what you need as a supervisor to effectively manage employee accommodation requests?
runs.french_text: Avez-vous les moyens nécessaires pour gérer efficacement les demandes d'accommodement des employés en tant que superviseur ?

paragraphs.text: Support from direct supervisor when dealing with requests.

runs.french_text: lors de la gestion des demandes.

paragraphs.text: Support from senior management when dealing with requests.
"There should be more step by step instructions for team leaders, managers and HR in order to streamline the process."

runs.text: "There should be more step by step instructions for team leaders, managers and HR in order to streamline the process."
runs.french_text: "Il y aurait plus besoin d'instructions étape par étape pour les chefs d'équipe, les managers et le service des ressources humaines afin de simplifier le processus."

paragraphs.text: "A step by step process document that is easy to follow and reduces unnecessary steps and approvals."

runs.text: "A step by step process document that is easy to follow and reduces unnecessary steps and approvals."
runs.french_text: Un document de processus étape par étape qui est facile à suivre et qui réduit les étapes et approbations inutiles.

paragraphs.text: "Someone knowledgeable on this topic with whom we could talk in person, instead of trying to navigate and interpret the various laws and policies."

runs.text: "Someone knowledgeable on this topic with whom we could talk in person, instead of trying to navigate and interpret the various laws and policies."
runs.french_text: « Quelqu'un qui connaît ce sujet et avec qui nous pourrions avoir une conversation en personne, au lieu de tenter de naviguer et d'interpréter les différentes lois et politiques. »

paragraphs.text: "I would like to have access to specialists such as an occupational therapist, mental health specialist, physiotherapist, etc. that can confirm the best approaches."

runs.text: "I would like to have access to specialists such as an occupational therapist, mental health specialist, physiotherapist, etc. that can confirm the best approaches."
runs.french_text: « Je voudrais avoir accès à des spécialistes tels qu'un ergothérapeute, un spécialiste en santé mentale, un physiothérapeute, etc., qui puissent confirmer les meilleures approches. »

paragraphs.text: "I think that a more centralized approach (…) would ensure uniformity."

runs.text: "I think that a more centralized approach (…) would ensure uniformity."
runs.french_text: « Je pense qu'une approche plus centralisée (...) garantirait l'uniformité. »

paragraphs.text: "There should be a specialist dealing with all accommodations. This would be more efficient because accommodation requests are relatively rare. Why should each team leader be forced to learn or re-learn all of the related HR procedures once every year or two?"

runs.text: "There should be a specialist dealing with all accommodations. This would be more efficient because accommodation requests are relatively rare. Why should each team leader be forced to learn or re-learn all of the related HR procedures once every year or two?"
runs.french_text: « Il devrait y avoir un spécialiste chargé de tous les logements. Cela serait plus efficace, car les demandes de logement sont relativement rares. Pourquoi chaque chef d'équipe devrait-il être contraint d'apprendre ou de reapprendre toutes les procédures HR liées toutes les années ou toutes les deux années ? »
Plus ou des ressources informatives meilleures.

paragraphs.text: "A proper (departmental website) or portal that outlines the process, a properly staffed disability management unit where employees and supervisors can obtain responses in a timely manner."

runs.text: proper (departmental website) or portal that outlines the process, a properly staffed disability management unit where employees and supervisors can
runs.french_text: un site web (du ministère) ou un portail qui décrit la procédure, une unité de gestion des handicaps correctement dotée d'employés et de superviseurs qui peuvent

runs.text: obtain responses in a timely manner."
runs.french_text: Obtenir des réponses de manière ponctuelle.

paragraphs.text: "Redo the TBS website and update the info on the Disability Management Tool and Managers and Employee Handbook tools on the website to reflect current information."

runs.text: "Redo the TBS website and update the info on the Disability Management Tool and Managers and Employee Handbook tools on the website to reflect current information."
runs.french_text: "Refaire le site Web de la TBS et mettre à jour les informations sur l'outil de gestion des incapacités, ainsi que sur les outils du Manuel du gestionnaire et du Manuel du employé, sur le site Web afin de refléter les informations actuelles."

paragraphs.text: Overall satisfaction with the accommodation process.

runs.text: Overall satisfaction with the accommodation process.
runs.french_text: Satisfaction globale avec le processus d'hébergement.

paragraphs.text: How helpful the “accommodation passport” would be to people in your situation / for everyone?

runs.text: How helpful the “accommodation passport” would be to people in your situation / for everyone?
runs.french_text: Comment le « passeport d’ajustements fonctionnels » serait-il utile pour les personnes dans votre situation / pour tout le monde ?

runs.text: Feelings about federal public service career (next 5 years).
runs.french_text: Sentiments concernant une carrière dans la fonction publique fédérale (prochaines 5 ans).

runs.text: Request approved and fully in place.
runs.french_text: Demande approuvée et pleinement mise en œuvre.

paragraphs.text: Request approved and partially in place.

runs.text: Request approved and partially in place.
runs.french_text: Demande approuvée et partiellement mise en œuvre.

runs.text: Negative career effect due to health condition or disability.
runs.french_text: Effet négatif sur la carrière en raison d'une condition de santé ou d'une incapacité.

runs.french_text: A opté pour le retrait d'un processus de recrutement

runs.french_text: Se sentir sous-employé ou pas assez stimulé

paragraphs.text: Perceived factors contributing to rejection of the accommodation request (top responses only).

runs.text: Perceived factors contributing to rejection of the accommodation request (top responses only).
runs.french_text: Facteurs perçus contribuant au rejet de la demande d'accommodement (réponses principales uniquement).

paragraphs.text: Those whose accommodation request was denied.

runs.text: Those whose accommodation request was denied.
runs.french_text: Ceux dont la demande d'hébergement a été refusée.

paragraphs.text: Management had negative perceptions about my specific condition or disability.

runs.text: Management had negative perceptions about my specific condition or disability.
runs.french_text: Le management avait des perceptions négatives concernant mon état particulier ou mon Handicap.

paragraphs.text: A general lack of knowledge about my specific condition or disability.

runs.text: A general lack of knowledge about my specific condition or disability.
runs.french_text: Un manque général de connaissance concernant ma condition ou mon handicap spécifique.

paragraphs.text: Management was unwilling to vary policies.

runs.text: Management was unwilling to vary policies.
runs.french_text: La direction n'était pas prête à modifier les politiques.

paragraphs.text: Management was concerned it would establish a precedent.

runs.text: Management was concerned it would establish a precedent.
runs.french_text: Le management s'inquiétait de l'établissement d'un précédent.

paragraphs.text: Find a new job or team.

runs.text: Find a new job or team.
runs.french_text: Trouvez un nouveau travail ou une nouvelle équipe.

paragraphs.text: A common response is to move to another team within the public service or look for alternative employment outside of the public service. Some have already moved to another position and others are in the process of trying to do so.

runs.text: A common response is to move to another team within the public service or look for alternative
runs.french_text: Une réponse courante consiste à rejoindre une autre équipe au sein du service public ou à rechercher des alternatives.

runs.text: employment outside of the public service. Some have
runs.french_text: emploi en dehors des services publics. Certains ont

runs.text: already moved to another position and others are in the process of trying to do so.
runs.french_text: déjà passés à une autre position et d'autres essaient encore de le faire.

paragraphs.text: Continue to work without the accommodation.

runs.text: Continue to work without the accommodation.

paragraphs.text: Some employees without an accommodation have continued in their current position, to the best of their abilities, despite not being equipped to make their full contribution. Others say they have abandoned their request after weighing it against potential damage to their future career prospects.

runs.text: Some employees without an accommodation have continued in their current position, to the best of their abilities, despite not being equipped to make their full contribution. Others say they have abandoned their request after weighing it against potential damage to their future career prospects.
runs.french_text: Certains employés qui n'avaient pas d'accommodement ont continué à occuper leur poste actuel, du mieux qu'ils le pouvaient, malgré le fait qu'ils n'étaient pas équipés pour faire pleinement contribution. D'autres affirment avoir abandonné leur demande après avoir pesé les avantages contre les dommages potentiels pour leur avenir professionnel.

paragraphs.text: Appeal or try again to get the accommodation.

runs.text: Appeal or try again to get the accommodation.
runs.french_text: Appel ou réessayer pour obtenir l'hébergement.

paragraphs.text: Some employees mention trying to get their accommodation by appealing to a disability champion or advisory committee, or through a complaint under the Canadian Human Rights Act.

runs.text: Some employees mention trying to get their accommodation by appealing to a disability champion or advisory committee, or through a complaint under the Canadian Human Rights Act.
runs.french_text: Certains employés mentionnent avoir tenté d'obtenir leur logement en s'adressant à un champion de la diversité ou à un comité consultatif, ou par la suite d'une plainte en vertu de la Loi canadienne sur les droits de l'homme.

paragraphs.text: Some employees intend to retire earlier than planned in order to avoid working without an accommodation.

runs.text: Some employees intend to retire earlier than planned in order to avoid working without an accommodation.
runs.french_text: Certains employés souhaitent reprendre la retraite plus tôt que prévu afin d'éviter de travailler sans accommodation.

paragraphs.text: Other employees reported a need to take extended sick leave as a result of not being appropriately accommodated.

runs.text: Other employees reported a need to take extended sick leave as a result of not being appropriately accommodated.
runs.french_text: D'autres employés ont signalé avoir eu besoin de prendre des congés maladie prolongés en raison du fait qu'ils n'avaient pas été convenablement accommodés.
État de santé ou type de handicap.

paragraphs.text: Ever taken extended sick leave due to chronic condition not being appropriately accommodated?

runs.text: Ever taken extended sick leave due to chronic condition not being appropriately accommodated?
runs.french_text: Avez-vous déjà dû prendre une longue période de congé maladie en raison d'une condition chronique qui n'a pas été correctement prise en charge ?
Condition de santé chronique ou douleur
Problèmes de flexibilité ou de dextérité

paragraphs.text: Length of time on extended sick leave as a result of not being appropriately accommodated.

runs.text: Length of time on extended sick leave as a result of not being appropriately accommodated.
runs.french_text: Durée du temps en congé de maladie prolongé en raison d'un manque d'adaptation appropriée.

paragraphs.text: Employees who have taken extended sick leave.

runs.text: Employees who have taken extended sick leave.
runs.french_text: Employés ayant pris une longue période de congés maladie.

paragraphs.text: Satisfaction with level of support and/or accommodation when returning from leave.

runs.text: Satisfaction with level of support and/or accommodation when returning from leave.
runs.french_text: Satisfaction quant au niveau de soutien et/ou d'accommodement lors du retour d'absence.

paragraphs.text: Employees who have taken extended sick leave.

runs.text: Employees who have taken extended sick leave.
runs.french_text: Employés ayant pris une longue période de congé maladie.

paragraphs.text: Many of these employees mention that, if they had been properly accommodated, they would not have had to go on extended sick leave. They mention that, if their accommodation request had been handled proactively and within a reasonable amount of time, the leave could have been avoided.

runs.text: Many of these employees mention that, if they had been properly accommodated, they would not have had to go on extended sick leave. They mention that, if their accommodation request had been handled proactively and within a reasonable amount of time, the leave could have been avoided.
runs.french_text: Beaucoup de ces employés mentionnent qu'ils n'auraient pas eu besoin de prendre une longue période de congé maladie s'ils avaient été correctement accommodés. Ils indiquent également que, si leur demande d'accommodement avait été traitée de manière proactive et dans un délai raisonnable, le congé aurait pu être évité.

paragraphs.text: A common reason provided for the lack of accommodation was managers ignoring medical advice provided to employees leading up to the extended sick leave.

runs.text: A common reason provided for the lack of accommodation was managers ignoring medical advice provided to employees leading up to the extended sick leave.
runs.french_text: Une raison fréquemment citée pour l'absence d'accommodement était l'ignorance des conseils médicaux donnés aux employés avant l'absence prolongée de maladie par les managers.

paragraphs.text: A lack of support and understanding for employees was also mentioned as a contributing factor in taking  extended sick leave, as this often exacerbated underlying issues.

runs.text: A lack of support and understanding for employees was also mentioned as a contributing factor in taking  extended sick leave, as this often exacerbated underlying issues.
runs.french_text: Un manque de soutien et de compréhension envers les employés a également été mentionné comme un facteur contributif dans l'prise de congés maladie prolongés, car cela aggravait souvent des problèmes sous-jacents.

paragraphs.text: Promoting better understanding of the process.

runs.text: Promoting better understanding of the process.
runs.french_text: Promouvoir une meilleure compréhension du processus.

paragraphs.text: A number of employees report being unaware of, or not knowledgeable enough about, the duty to accommodate and the options available to them before taking sick leave to have been able to avoid it.

runs.text: A number of employees report being unaware of, or not knowledgeable enough about, the duty to accommodate and the options available to them before taking sick leave to have been able to avoid it.
runs.french_text: Un certain nombre d'employés rapportent ne pas être conscients, ou ne pas être suffisamment informés, de leur obligation d'accommodement et des options qui leur sont offertes avant de prendre un congé maladie, afin d'éviter cela.

paragraphs.text: Increased or improved support on returning from previous leave.

runs.text: Increased or improved support on returning from previous leave.
runs.french_text: Soutien accru ou amélioré lors du retour d'une congé précédent.

paragraphs.text: Some employees report a lack of support and understanding when returning to work from an earlier extended sick leave, resulting in the situation worsening over time and requiring another extended leave.

runs.text: Some employees report a lack of support and understanding when returning to work from an earlier extended sick leave, resulting in the situation worsening over time and requiring another extended leave.
runs.french_text: Certains employés rapportent un manque de soutien et de compréhension lorsqu'ils retrouvent le travail après une période prolongée d'absence maladie, ce qui entraîne l'aggravation de la situation au fil du temps et la nécessité d'une autre période prolongée d'absence.

paragraphs.text: Lack of medical necessity for accommodation.

runs.text: Lack of medical necessity for accommodation.
runs.french_text: Absence de nécessité médicale pour l'accommodation.

paragraphs.text: A common reason for request denial is that the medical evidence provided by the employee did not adequately demonstrate that functional limitations exist or did not justify the requested accommodation.

runs.text: A common reason for request denial is that the medical evidence provided by the employee did not adequately demonstrate that functional limitations exist or did not justify the requested accommodation.
runs.french_text: Une raison fréquente de refus d'une demande est que les preuves médicales fournies par le salarié n'ont pas suffisamment démontré l'existence de limitations fonctionnelles ou n'ont pas justifié l'accommodement demandé.
Confondre un « désir » avec un « besoin ».

paragraphs.text: Some supervisors explain that, since current guidelines indicate that accommodations must be based on functional limitations, denials occur when a request is perceived as a ‘want’ instead of a need.

runs.text: Some supervisors explain that, since current guidelines indicate that accommodations must be based on functional limitations, denials occur when a request is perceived as a ‘want’ instead of a need.
runs.french_text: Certains superviseurs expliquent que, puisque les lignes directrices actuelles indiquent que les accommodements doivent s'appuyer sur des limites fonctionnelles, les refus surviennent lorsque la demande est perçue comme un « vouloir » plutôt qu'un « besoin ».

paragraphs.text: In some cases, supervisors perceive that it is not possible to accommodate the employee within their current position based on their functional limitations. This may be due to conflict with other requirements, core job functions or a belief that the accommodation would affect the organizational workflow too negatively.

runs.text: In some cases, supervisors perceive that it is not possible to accommodate the employee within their current position based on their functional limitations. This may be due to conflict with other requirements, core job functions or a belief that the accommodation would affect the organizational workflow too negatively.
runs.french_text: Dans certains cas, les superviseurs perçoivent qu'il n'est pas possible d'adapter l'employé à son poste actuel en raison de ses limites fonctionnelles. Cela peut être dû à un conflit avec d'autres exigences, fonctions clés du poste ou à une croyance selon laquelle l'adaptation aurait un impact trop négatif sur le processus de travail organisationnel.

paragraphs.text: Unwillingness to compromise or to accept alternate accommodations.

runs.text: Unwillingness to compromise or to accept alternate accommodations.
runs.french_text: Résistance à la compromis ou à l'acceptation d'autres accommodements.

paragraphs.text: In other cases, employees may be offered alternate accommodations or arrangements that are different from what was originally requested (including a change of position or location), which employees are often unwilling to accept.

runs.text: In other cases, employees may be offered alternate accommodations or arrangements that are different from what was originally requested (including a change of position or location), which employees are often unwilling to accept.
runs.french_text: Dans d'autres cas, les employés peuvent être proposés des accommodements ou des arrangements alternatifs différents de ceux initialement demandés (y compris un changement de poste ou de lieu), que les employés sont souvent réticents à accepter.

paragraphs.text: Some supervisors describe situations where employees were denied accommodations because of fear among management that it would set a precedent or because they viewed the employee as a ‘trouble employee.’

runs.text: Some supervisors describe situations where employees were denied accommodations because of fear among management that it would set a precedent or because they viewed the employee as a ‘trouble employee.’
runs.french_text: Certains superviseurs décrivent des situations où des employés ont été refusés des accommodements en raison de la peur de la direction que cela pourrait établir un précédent ou parce qu'ils considéraient l'employé comme un « employé problématique ».
Prenez les demandes d'hébergement au sérieux.

paragraphs.text: Trust that employees genuinely need the accommodation to be able to contribute to their fullest potential. Do not view it as the employee’s fault and understand that making the request is a difficult thing to do.

runs.text: Trust that employees genuinely need the accommodation to be able to contribute to their fullest potential. Do not view it as the employee’s fault and understand that making the request is a difficult thing to do.
runs.french_text: Faites confiance au fait que les employés ont vraiment besoin de l'accommodement pour pouvoir contribuer pleinement à leur potentiel. Ne le voyez pas comme une faute de la part de l'employé et comprenez que faire la demande peut être une chose difficile à accomplir.

paragraphs.text: People with accommodations are not lazy or less capable.

runs.text: People with accommodations are not lazy or less capable.
runs.french_text: Les personnes avec des accommodations ne sont pas paresseuses ou moins compétentes.

paragraphs.text: Do not judge people based on their limitations or see people who require accommodation as less able to perform their job-related duties. Recognize that employees want to contribute and are able to excel if provided with the support they require.

runs.text: Do not judge people based on their limitations or see people who require accommodation as less able to perform their job-related duties. Recognize that employees want to contribute and are able to excel if provided with the support they require.
runs.french_text: Ne jugez pas les personnes en fonction de leurs limitations ou ne considérez pas les personnes nécessitant des aménagements comme moins capables d'accomplir les tâches liées à leur poste. Reconnaissez que les employés souhaitent contribuer et sont capables de s'exceller s'ils bénéficient du soutien dont ils ont besoin.

paragraphs.text: Show empathy and openness to the accommodation process. Understand the vulnerable position the employee is in when requesting it. Do not pre-judge specific types of conditions or disabilities; instead, try to learn more about them.

runs.text: Show empathy and openness to the accommodation process. Understand the vulnerable position the employee is in when requesting it. Do not pre-judge specific types of conditions or disabilities; instead, try to learn more about them.
runs.french_text: Montrer de l'empathie et de l'ouverture envers le processus d'adaptation. Comprendre la position vulnérable de l'employé lorsqu'il fait une demande. Ne pas porter de jugement préalable sur les types spécifiques de conditions ou d'handicaps ; essayez plutôt d'en apprendre davantage sur eux.

paragraphs.text: Maintain an open, two-way dialogue with employees to understand their position. Continually update employees while a request is ongoing and check-in and follow-up regularly.

runs.text: Maintain an open, two-way dialogue with employees to understand their position. Continually update employees while a request is ongoing and check-in and follow-up regularly.
runs.french_text: Maintenir un dialogue ouvert et bilatéral avec les employés pour comprendre leur point de vue. Mettre régulièrement à jour les employés tout au long du traitement d'une demande et effectuer des vérifications et des suivis réguliers.
Comprendre les conditions et les handicaps invisibles.

paragraphs.text: Recognize that not all disabilities are visible and that, although a person may be smiling, it doesn’t mean they are happy.

runs.text: Recognize that not all disabilities are visible and that, although a person may be smiling, it doesn’t mean they are happy.
runs.french_text: Reconnaître que toutes les handicaps ne sont pas visibles et que, bien qu'une personne puisse sourire, cela ne signifie pas nécessairement qu'elle soit heureuse.

paragraphs.text: Accommodations are not an attempt to do less work.

runs.text: Accommodations are not an attempt to do less work.
runs.french_text: Les accommodements ne visent pas à faire moins de travail.

paragraphs.text: Recognize that the aim of accommodations is to make the employee a more productive worker, not to make their job easier. They are not special treatment or an advantage for people who do not have the same functional abilities, they provide the support required to enable the employee to contribute to the same degree as everyone else.

runs.text: of accommodations is to make the employee a more productive worker, not to make their job easier. They are not special treatment or an advantage for people who do not have the same functional abilities, they provide the support required to enable the employee to contribute to the same degree as everyone else.
runs.french_text: L'objectif des aménagements est de rendre l'employé un travailleur plus productif, et non de faciliter son travail. Ce n'est pas un traitement spécial ou un avantage pour les personnes qui n'ont pas les mêmes capacités fonctionnelles, ils fournissent le soutien nécessaire pour permettre à l'employé de contribuer dans la même mesure que les autres.

paragraphs.text: Treat employees with accommodations with respect. Do not discuss, comment or joke about someone’s condition or accommodation. Be supportive and non-judgmental.

runs.text: Treat employees with accommodations with respect. Do not discuss, comment or joke about someone’s condition or accommodation. Be supportive and non-judgmental.
runs.french_text: Traitez les employés qui bénéficient d'accommodements avec respect. Ne discutez pas, ne commentez pas ou ne faites pas de blagues sur l'état de santé ou l'accommodement d'une personne. Soyez bienveillant et non jugementaire.

paragraphs.text: An accommodation does not mean someone is less capable.

runs.text: An accommodation does not mean someone is less capable.
runs.french_text: Un accommodement ne signifie pas que quelqu'un est moins capable.

paragraphs.text: Recognize that the need for accommodations to perform their job-related duties doesn't make someone any less capable or skilled.

runs.text: Recognize that the need for accommodations to perform their job-related duties doesn't make someone any less capable or skilled.
runs.french_text: Reconnaître que le besoin d'accommodements pour accomplir leurs tâches professionnelles ne rend pas quelqu'un moins compétent ou moins qualifié.
Comprendre les conditions et les handicaps invisibles.

paragraphs.text: Understand that a disability or condition may not always be visible to them, but that does not mean it is not present. Show understanding and patience.

runs.text: Understand that a disability or condition may not always be visible to them, but that does not mean it is not present. Show understanding and patience.
runs.french_text: Comprendre que une déficience ou une condition peut ne pas toujours être visible, mais cela ne signifie pas qu'elle n'existe pas. Montrez de l'entente et de la patience.

paragraphs.text: Amount of time and effort required to navigate process.

runs.text: Amount of time and effort required to navigate process.
runs.french_text: Quantité de temps et d'efforts requis pour naviguer dans le processus.

paragraphs.text: Understand how much time supervisors spend administering these requests. This goes along with expressing how complicated, cumbersome and time consuming the process for accommodation is and that there are ways in which it could be simplified.

runs.text: Understand how much time supervisors spend administering these requests. This goes along with expressing how complicated, cumbersome and time consuming the process for accommodation is and that there are ways in which it could be simplified.
runs.french_text: Comprendre combien de temps les superviseurs y consacrent pour traiter ces demandes. Cela s'inscrit également dans l'expression de la complexité, de la lourdeur et de la consommation de temps du processus d'accommodation, ainsi que dans le fait qu'il existe des moyens de le simplifier.
Faites confiance à vos employés et montrez de la compassion.

paragraphs.text: More trust and compassion should be shown toward employees. Many said their senior management feel that employees are looking for special treatment. Taking a more positive approach to accommodations would improve outcomes by giving employees the tools they need to succeed with less effort.

runs.text: More trust and compassion should be shown toward
runs.french_text: Plus de confiance et de compassion devraient être témoignées envers

runs.text: employees. Many said their senior management feel that employees are looking for special treatment. Taking a more positive approach to
runs.french_text: employés. Beaucoup ont dit que leur direction supérieure pense que les employés cherchent un traitement spécial. Adopter une approche plus positive concernant

runs.text: accommodations would improve outcomes by giving employees the tools they need to succeed with less effort.
runs.french_text: Les aménagements amélioreraient les résultats en donnant aux employés les outils nécessaires pour réussir avec moins d'efforts.

paragraphs.text: Play a larger role in accommodations.

runs.text: Play a larger role in accommodations.
runs.french_text: Jouer un rôle plus important dans les logements.

paragraphs.text: Play a larger role by providing: more guidance about what should and should not be covered in accommodations, having a centralized fund for accommodations, providing cross-department support or resources where it is necessary to find alternative positions for accommodated employees, and responding more promptly when their personal input is required for a request.

runs.text: Play a larger role by providing: more guidance about what should and should not be covered in accommodations, having a centralized fund for accommodations, providing cross-department support or resources where it is necessary to find alternative positions for accommodated employees, and responding more promptly when their personal input is required for a request.
runs.french_text: Jouer un rôle plus important en fournissant : plus de guidance sur ce qui devrait et ne devrait pas être couvert dans les accommodations, un fonds centralisé pour les accommodations, des ressources ou un soutien inter-services lorsque cela est nécessaire pour trouver des postes alternatifs pour les employés accommodés, et répondre plus rapidement lorsqu'une contribution personnelle est requise pour une demande.

paragraphs.text: Training about accommodations should be provided for all supervisors who may have to handle requests when they start in their positions.

runs.text: Training about accommodations should be provided for all supervisors who may have to handle requests when they start in their positions.
runs.french_text: La formation sur les accommodements doit être dispensée à tous les superviseurs qui pourraient avoir à gérer des demandes lorsqu'ils commencent leurs fonctions.

paragraphs.text: A better understanding that accommodations are meant to address a functional limitation.

runs.text: A better understanding that accommodations are meant to address a functional limitation.
runs.french_text: Une meilleure compréhension que les accommodations visent à répondre à une limitation fonctionnelle.

paragraphs.text: Understand that current guidelines require that an accommodation be demonstrably linked to a functional limitation. It would be helpful to provide employees who are considering a request with brief documents or videos explaining criteria for an accommodation.

runs.text: Understand that current guidelines require that an accommodation be demonstrably linked to a functional limitation. It would be helpful to provide employees who are considering a request with brief documents or videos explaining criteria for an accommodation.
runs.french_text: Comprendre que les directives actuelles exigent que l'accommodement soit clairement lié à une limitation fonctionnelle. Il serait utile de fournir aux employés qui envisagent une demande des documents ou des vidéos succincts expliquant les critères d'accommodement.

paragraphs.text: Having a solid understanding of how the request process works is also beneficial so employees understand what their role and responsibilities are. Have a clear understanding of the purpose of medical documentation, so they can provide what their supervisor needs in order to approve the request.

runs.text: Having a solid understanding of how the request process works is also beneficial so employees understand what their role and responsibilities are. Have a clear understanding of the purpose of medical documentation, so they can provide what their supervisor needs in order to approve the request.
runs.french_text: Avoir une bonne compréhension du fonctionnement du processus de demande est également bénéfique afin que les employés sachent quelles sont leurs rôles et responsabilités. Avoir une compréhension claire de l'objectif des documents médicaux leur permet de fournir ce que leur superviseur a besoin pour approuver la demande.

paragraphs.text: Supervisors and managers want to be open to, and actively collaborate with, employees to find a solution that is acceptable to both parties.

runs.text: Supervisors and managers want to be open to, and actively collaborate with, employees to find a solution that is acceptable to both parties.
runs.french_text: Les superviseurs et les managers souhaitent être ouverts et collaborer activement avec les employés pour trouver une solution acceptable pour les deux parties.

paragraphs.text: Employees are not guaranteed their preferred outcome.

runs.text: Employees are not guaranteed their preferred outcome.
runs.french_text: Les employés ne sont pas assurés d'obtenir leur résultat préféré.

paragraphs.text: The outcome of the process could be different from what the employee preferred, and it may require a change in position or location. It is important that the employee know and understand in advance that this is a possibility.

runs.text: The outcome of the process could be different from what the employee preferred, and it may require a change in position or location. It is important that the employee know and understand in advance that this is a possibility.
runs.french_text: Le résultat du processus pourrait être différent de ce que l'employé préférait, et il pourrait exiger un changement de poste ou de localisation. Il est important que l'employé sache et comprenne d'avance que cela est une possibilité.

paragraphs.text: What did we learn? What can we explore further?

runs.french_text: Qu'est-ce que nous pouvons explorer davantage ?

paragraphs.text: Employees experience fear and anxiety before making accommodation requests. They are concerned about:

runs.text: Employees experience fear and anxiety before making accommodation requests.
runs.french_text: Les employés éprouvent de la peur et de l'anxiété avant de faire des demandes d'accommodement.

paragraphs.text: Damaging their reputation with fellow employees;

runs.text: Damaging their reputation with fellow employees;
runs.french_text: Détériorer leur réputation auprès de leurs collègues ;
Souffrir de représailles de la part des superviseurs ;

paragraphs.text: Hurting their career prospects in the public service;

runs.text: Hurting their career prospects in the public service;
runs.french_text: Nuire à leurs perspectives de carrière dans la fonction publique ;

paragraphs.text: When asked about their feelings before making the request, employees report negative emotions and raise these concerns as the reasons why (slide 8).

runs.text: When asked about their feelings before making the request, employees report negative emotions and raise these concerns as the reasons why (
runs.french_text: Lorsqu'ils sont interrogés sur leurs émotions avant de faire la demande, les employés signalent des émotions négatives et évoquent ces préoccupations comme les raisons pour lesquelles (

paragraphs.text: Employees with a health condition or disability who have made an accommodation request report experiencing discrimination and harassment more often than employees with disabilities in general reported in the PSES. They believe that their condition or disability is connected to the harassment and discrimination in a large majority of cases (slide 9).

runs.text: Employees with a health condition or disability who have made an accommodation request report experiencing discrimination and harassment more often than employees with disabilities in general reported in the PSES. They believe that their condition or disability is connected to the harassment and discrimination in a large majority of cases (
runs.french_text: Les employés ayant une condition de santé ou un handicap qui ont formulé une demande d'accommodement rapportent plus souvent avoir subi de la discrimination et de la harcèlement que les employés en situation de handicap dans l'ensemble, selon le PSES. Ils considèrent que leur condition ou leur handicap est en lien avec le harcèlement et la discrimination dans la majorité des cas.

paragraphs.text: More than four in ten have previously chosen not to request an accommodation that would have improved their ability to contribute on the job; the reasons often include concerns about management or supervisor perceptions and career implications (slide 10).

runs.text: More than four in ten have previously chosen not to request an accommodation that would have improved their ability to contribute on the job; the reasons often include concerns about management or supervisor perceptions and career implications
runs.french_text: Plus de quatre sur dix ont précédemment choisi de ne pas demander un aménagement qui aurait amélioré leur capacité à contribuer sur le lieu de travail ; les raisons souvent citées incluent des préoccupations concernant les perceptions des gestionnaires ou des supérieurs hiérarchiques ainsi que des implications sur leur carrière.

paragraphs.text: Employees perceive the need for an advocate to help them navigate the process and act on their behalf with unsupportive or adversarial managers (slides 18 and 24).

runs.text: Employees perceive the need for an advocate to help them navigate the process and act on their behalf with unsupportive or adversarial managers (slides
runs.french_text: Les employés perçoivent le besoin d'un avocat pour les aider à naviguer dans le processus et agir en leur nom face à des gestionnaires non coopératifs ou adverses (diapositives

paragraphs.text: Many supervisors say they lack experience and knowledge about the accommodation process and request more training and resources for navigating the process, including a more consistent or centralized accommodation process, step-by-step instructions and greater access to information and functional experts.

runs.text: Many supervisors say they lack experience and knowledge
runs.french_text: Beaucoup de superviseurs disent manquer d'expérience et de connaissances.

runs.text: about the accommodation process and request more training and resources for navigating the process, including a more consistent or centralized accommodation process, step-by-step instructions and greater access to information and functional experts.
runs.french_text: en ce qui concerne le processus d'accommodation, et demande davantage de formation et de ressources pour naviguer dans ce processus, notamment un processus d'accommodation plus cohérent ou centralisé, des instructions pas à pas et un accès accru à l'information et aux experts fonctionnels.

paragraphs.text: A majority of supervisors have handled an average of one request per year or fewer (slide 6).

runs.text: A majority of supervisors have handled an average of one request per year or fewer (
runs.french_text: La majorité des superviseurs ont géré en moyenne une demande par an ou moins (

paragraphs.text: Many supervisors say they do not find the accommodation process clear (37%) or that it lacks clarity on who to contact for assistance (32%) (slide 12). When asked how the process could be made clearer, supervisors suggest resources that outline how the process works, a better organization of existing resources and more training on how to handle requests (slide 13).

runs.text: Many supervisors say they do not find the accommodation process clear (37%) or that it lacks clarity on who to contact for assistance (32%) (
runs.french_text: De nombreux superviseurs indiquent qu'ils ne trouvent pas le processus d'accommodation clair (37 %) ou qu'il manque de clarté sur la personne à contacter pour obtenir de l'aide (32 %).

paragraphs.text: Many employees cite their supervisor’s lack of knowledge and understanding about the accommodation process as a challenge when making an accommodation request (slide 11) and suggest better supervisor training as a solution (slide 24).

runs.text: Many employees cite their supervisor’s lack of knowledge and understanding about the accommodation process as a challenge when making an accommodation request (

paragraphs.text: A key supervisor message for senior management is that they should receive more guidance and that better training should be provided (slide 41).

runs.text: A key supervisor message for senior management is that they should receive more guidance and that better training should be provided (
runs.french_text: Un message clé pour la direction supérieure est qu'ils devraient recevoir plus de guidance et que des formations plus efficaces devraient être fournies (

paragraphs.text: What did we learn? What can we explore further?

runs.french_text: Qu'est-ce que nous pouvons explorer davantage ?

paragraphs.text: Supervisors lack the resources and support from functional experts they need to handle accommodation requests in the most efficient and effective way.

runs.text: Supervisors lack the resources and support from functional experts
runs.french_text: Les superviseurs manquent de ressources et de soutien des experts fonctionnels.

runs.text: they need to handle accommodation requests in the most efficient and effective way.
runs.french_text: Ils doivent gérer les demandes d'hébergement de la manière la plus efficace et efficace possible.

paragraphs.text: When supervisors are asked about what challenges they face during the process, they mention a need for more 'hands-on' assistance from functional experts (slide 19).

runs.text: When supervisors are asked about what challenges they face during the process, they mention a need for more 'hands-on' assistance from functional experts (
runs.french_text: Lorsque les superviseurs sont interrogés sur les défis qu'ils rencontrent durant le processus, ils mentionnent un besoin de plus d'assistance « mains sur le terrain » d'experts fonctionnels (

paragraphs.text: A third of supervisors (34%) disagree that they have what they need to effectively manage accommodation requests (slide 25). When asked what resources would help them successfully navigate accommodation requests, suggestions include greater access to experts and better informational resources (slide 26).

runs.text: A third of supervisors (34%) disagree that they have what they need to effectively manage accommodation requests (

runs.text: ). When asked what resources would help them successfully navigate accommodation requests, suggestions include greater access to experts and better informational resources (
runs.french_text: ). Lorsqu'on les demande quels ressources les aideraient à réussir la navigation dans les demandes d'accommodement, les suggestions incluent un accès accru aux experts et des ressources informatives plus pertinentes (

paragraphs.text: Key messages from supervisors for senior management is to understand how time and resource intensive the process is for supervisors, and that senior management should trust employees, show compassion and play a larger role by providing more guidance and responding more promptly when their personal input is required for a request (slide 41).

runs.text: Key messages from supervisors for senior management is to understand how time and resource intensive the process is for supervisors, and that senior management should trust employees, show compassion and play a larger role by providing more guidance and responding more promptly when their personal input is required for a request (
runs.french_text: Les messages clés des superviseurs pour la direction supérieure consistent à comprendre à quel point le processus est chronophage et exigeant en ressources pour les superviseurs, et que la direction supérieure devrait faire confiance aux employés, montrer de la compassion et jouer un rôle plus important en fournissant davantage de guidance et en répondant plus rapidement lorsqu'un apport personnel est requis pour une demande.

paragraphs.text: Both employees and supervisors feel the accommodation process needs to be streamlined in order to speed up the process.

runs.text: Both employees and supervisors feel the
runs.french_text: Les employés et les superviseurs ressentent tous les deux le

runs.text: accommodation process needs to be streamlined
runs.french_text: Le processus d'hébergement doit être simplifié.

runs.text: in order to speed up the process.

paragraphs.text: Employees cite the cumbersome nature of the process as a reason for being reluctant to make a request and they suggest a clearer and simpler process to make it easier to request an accommodation (slide 11). Employee dissatisfaction with the amount of time required to get an accommodation is high (40% where accommodation is in place, 71% where it is not) (slide 22).

runs.text: Employees cite the cumbersome nature of the process as a reason for being reluctant to make a request and they suggest a clearer and simpler process to make it easier to request an accommodation (
runs.french_text: Les employés citent la complexité du processus comme une raison de leur réticence à faire une demande et suggèrent un processus plus clair et plus simple pour faciliter la demande d'accommodement.

runs.text: ). Employee dissatisfaction with the amount of time required to get an accommodation is high (40% where accommodation is in place, 71% where it is not) (
runs.french_text: ). Le niveau de mécontentement des employés par rapport au temps requis pour obtenir un accommodement est élevé (40 % dans les cas où un accommodement est en place, 71 % dans les cas où il ne l'est pas) (

paragraphs.text: Both employees and supervisors (slides 15, 17, 19 and 41) commonly say that minimizing or eliminating requests for evidence would streamline the process significantly.

runs.text: ) commonly say that minimizing or eliminating requests for evidence would streamline the process significantly.
runs.french_text: On dit souvent que la minimisation ou l'élimination des demandes de preuves permettraient de simplifier considérablement le processus.

paragraphs.text: Supervisors describe 'red tape’, multiple approvals needed, issues with procurement processes and installation as challenges throughout the process. They suggest a more streamlined and simplified approach, especially for acquiring adaptive devices (slides 17, 19 and 23).

runs.french_text: Les superviseurs mentionnent le « bureaucratisme », la nécessité de multiples approbations, les problèmes liés aux processus d'approvisionnement et d'installation comme des défis tout au long du processus. Ils recommandent une approche plus simplifiée et optimisée, en particulier pour l'acquisition d'appareils adaptés (diapositives

paragraphs.text: Employees and supervisors say current assessment forms and processes are too complex and do not generate the information required from specialists (slides 11 and 15). Supervisors suggest simplifying the Occupational Fitness Assessment Form (OFAF) (slide 17).

runs.french_text: Les employés et les superviseurs affirment que les formulaires et les processus d'évaluation actuels sont trop complexes et ne génèrent pas les informations requises auprès des spécialistes (diapositives

paragraphs.text: What did we learn? What can we explore further?

runs.french_text: Qu'est-ce que nous pouvons explorer davantage ?

paragraphs.text: There is an impression that that the accommodation request process is adversarial and that attitudes toward those who make accommodation requests are negative. This can result in a less favourable environment for ensuring employees are properly accommodated.

runs.text: There is an impression that that the
runs.french_text: Il y a une impression que le
Le processus de demande d'hébergement est adversarial.

runs.text: and that attitudes toward those who make accommodation requests are negative. This can result in a less favourable environment for ensuring employees are properly accommodated.
runs.french_text: et que les attitudes envers ceux qui font des demandes d'accommodement sont négatives. Cela peut entraîner un environnement moins favorable pour garantir que les employés soient convenablement accommodés.

paragraphs.text: Employees cite unsupportive supervisors who need to be convinced that the accommodation is necessary as a major challenge. More supportive, empathetic, open and accepting attitudes from supervisors would lessen these challenges (slide 11). Having their supervisor ignore or doubt medical evidence is also an issue for some employees (slide 15).

runs.text: Employees cite unsupportive supervisors who need to be convinced that the accommodation is necessary as a major challenge. More supportive, empathetic, open and accepting attitudes from supervisors would lessen these challenges (
runs.french_text: Les employés mentionnent les superviseurs peu souteneurs qui doivent être convaincus que l'adaptation est nécessaire comme un défi majeur. Des attitudes plus soutenantes, empathiques, ouvertes et acceptantes de la part des superviseurs réduiraient ces défis.

runs.text: ). Having their supervisor ignore or doubt medical evidence is also an issue for some employees (
runs.french_text: ). Il s'agit également d'un problème pour certains employés que leur superviseur ignore ou mette en doute les preuves médicales (

paragraphs.text: Employees feel that supervisors need to take requests seriously, trust that employees genuinely need the accommodation and not view the situation as the employee’s fault (slide 39). They also feel supervisors should not act like the accommodation request is a burden to them (slide 18).

runs.text: Employees feel that supervisors need to take requests seriously, trust that employees genuinely need the accommodation and not view the situation as the employee’s fault (
runs.french_text: Les employés pensent que les superviseurs doivent prendre les demandes au sérieux, faire confiance au fait que les employés ont véritablement besoin de l'adaptation et ne pas considérer la situation comme une faute de l'employé.

runs.text: ). They also feel supervisors should not act like the accommodation request is a burden to them (
runs.french_text: Ils pensent également que les superviseurs ne devraient pas considérer la demande d'accommodation comme une charge pour eux.

paragraphs.text: A shift in perspective among some supervisors may be necessary to ensure they do not judge employees based on their limitations or see people who require accommodation as less able to perform their duties. It should be stressed that employees who request accommodation want to contribute and are able to excel if provided the support they require (slide 39).

runs.text: A shift in perspective among some supervisors may be necessary to ensure they do not judge employees based on their limitations or see people who require accommodation as less able to perform their duties. It should be stressed that employees who request accommodation want to contribute and are able to excel if provided the support they require (
runs.french_text: Un changement de perspective chez certains superviseurs pourrait être nécessaire pour s'assurer qu'ils ne jugent pas les employés sur leurs limites ou ne voient pas les personnes nécessitant un accompagnement comme moins capables d'accomplir leurs tâches. Il convient de souligner que les employés qui demandent un accompagnement souhaitent contribuer et sont capables de s'exceller si on leur fournit le soutien dont ils ont besoin (

paragraphs.text: Many supervisors agree, saying that more trust should be shown to employees around their needs for accommodation and question the need to provide evidence (slide 17).

runs.text: Many supervisors agree, saying that more trust should be shown to employees around their needs for accommodation and question the need to provide evidence (
runs.french_text: De nombreux superviseurs s'accordent à dire que plus de confiance devrait être accordée aux employés concernant leurs besoins en adaptation et questionnent la nécessité de fournir des preuves (

paragraphs.text: A significant barrier identified by many employees is the need to make multiple requests or repeatedly submit medical certificates and/or other evidence for the same accommodation due to a change in their position, physical office or supervisor.

runs.text: A significant barrier identified by many employees is the

runs.french_text: il faut faire plusieurs demandes ou soumettre répétitivement des certificats médicaux et/ou d'autres preuves pour le même accommodement

runs.text: due to a change in their position, physical office or supervisor.
runs.french_text: en raison d'un changement de poste, d'un bureau physique ou de leur superviseur.

paragraphs.text: Both employees and supervisors recommend the creation of a centralized file for information related to accommodations to avoid this situation (slides 24 and 26).

runs.french_text: Les employés et les superviseurs recommandent la création d'un dossier central pour l'information relative aux accommodations afin d'éviter cette situation (diapositives

paragraphs.text: Support for the proposed "accommodation passport“, which would streamline the process and document historical accommodations, thereby facilitating the transfer of employees’ approved accommodations to another department or position, is very high among both employees and supervisors (slide 28).

runs.text: Support for the proposed "accommodation passport“, which would streamline the process and document historical accommodations, thereby facilitating the transfer of employees’ approved accommodations to another department or position, is very high among both employees and supervisors (
runs.french_text: Soutien pour la proposition de « passeport d’ajustements fonctionnels », qui simplifierait le processus et documenterait les ajustements historiques, permettant ainsi le transfert des ajustements approuvés des employés vers un autre service ou poste, est très élevé à la fois parmi les employés et les superviseurs.

paragraphs.text: What did we learn? What can we explore further?

runs.french_text: Qu'est-ce que nous pouvons explorer davantage ?

paragraphs.text: An accommodation request process that is handled more centrally and less directly by supervisors is a common suggestion among both employees and supervisors. This type of approach could address numerous issues, help to streamline the process and result in better outcomes.

runs.text: An accommodation request process that is handled more centrally
runs.french_text: Un processus de demande d'accommodement géré de manière plus centralisée

runs.text: and less directly by supervisors is a common suggestion among both employees and supervisors. This type of approach could address numerous issues, help to streamline the process and result in better outcomes.
runs.french_text: et moins directement par les superviseurs est une suggestion courante à la fois des employés et des superviseurs. Cette approche pourrait résoudre de nombreux problèmes, aider à rationaliser le processus et aboutir à des résultats meilleurs.

paragraphs.text: Employees say a more impartial, arms-length process that relies less on supervisors would address concerns about a lack of supervisor experience and knowledge about accommodation, better protect personal health information, avoid potential reprisal from supervisors and alleviate concerns that supervisors and Labour Relations only work in management's interest (slide 11).

runs.text: Employees say a more impartial, arms-length process that relies less on supervisors would address concerns about a lack of supervisor experience and knowledge about accommodation, better protect personal health information, avoid potential reprisal from supervisors and alleviate concerns that supervisors and
runs.french_text: Les employés affirment qu'un processus plus impartial, à distance administrative, qui dépend moins des supérieurs hiérarchiques, permettrait de répondre aux préoccupations liées à l'insuffisance d'expérience et de connaissances des supérieurs concernant l'accommodement, de mieux protéger les informations sur la santé personnelle, d'éviter toute représailles potentielles de la part des supérieurs et de

runs.text: Relations only work in management's interest (
runs.french_text: Les relations ne servent qu'intérêts de la direction (

paragraphs.text: As most supervisors are not specialists in accommodations, a more centralized system would involve functional experts more in the process and take advantage of their expertise (slide 26).

runs.text: As most supervisors are not specialists in accommodations, a more centralized system would involve functional experts more in the process and take advantage of their expertise (
runs.french_text: Comme la plupart des superviseurs ne sont pas des spécialistes des aménagements, un système plus centralisé impliquerait davantage les experts fonctionnels dans le processus et tirerait parti de leur expertise (

paragraphs.text: A centralized system could also involve centralized funding, which would eliminate concerns about the cost to departmental budgets for accommodations (slide 23).

runs.text: A centralized system could also involve centralized funding, which would eliminate concerns about the cost to departmental budgets for accommodations (
runs.french_text: Un système centralisé pourrait également impliquer un financement centralisé, ce qui éliminerait les préoccupations concernant le coût pour les budgets des départements en matière d'accommodements (

paragraphs.text: A centralized approach would also increase consistency across departments (slides 13 and 17).

runs.text: A centralized approach would also increase consistency across departments (slides
runs.french_text: Une approche centralisée augmenterait également la cohérence entre les départements (diapositives

paragraphs.text: Not properly accommodating employees leads to negative outcomes such as employees leaving their position, leaving the public service altogether, retiring early, taking extended sick leaves and being unable to contribute to their full potential.

runs.text: Not properly accommodating employees leads to negative outcomes
runs.french_text: Ne pas accommoder correctement les employés entraîne des résultats négatifs.

runs.text: such as employees leaving their position, leaving the public service altogether, retiring early, taking extended sick leaves and being unable to contribute to their full potential.
runs.french_text: tels que les employés quittant leur poste, quittant le service public à l'ensemble, la retraite anticipée, les congés maladie prolongés et l'incapacité de contribuer pleinement à leur potentiel.

paragraphs.text: In instances where accommodation requests are denied, employees often feel they must choose between moving positions, leaving the public service, retiring earlier than planned, going on extended leave or carrying on working at a diminished capacity (slide 33).

runs.text: In instances where accommodation requests are denied, employees often feel they must choose between moving positions, leaving the public service, retiring earlier than planned, going on extended leave or carrying on working at a diminished capacity (
runs.french_text: Dans les cas où les demandes d'accommodement sont refusées, les employés se sentent souvent contraints de choisir entre changer de poste, quitter le service public, prendre une retraite anticipée, prendre une année sabattique prolongée ou continuer à travailler à un niveau réduit.

paragraphs.text: Four in ten employees say they have taken extended sick leave as a result of not being appropriately accommodated. This is especially common among those with mental health issues (slide 34). Almost a quarter of employees who went on extended sick leave due to a lack of appropriate accommodation were away for more than six months (slide 35).

runs.text: Four in ten employees say they have taken extended sick leave as a result of not being appropriately accommodated. This is especially common among those with mental health issues (
runs.french_text: Quatre sur dix employés déclarent avoir pris une période prolongée d'absence maladie en raison du fait qu'ils n'ont pas été convenablement accommodés. Cela est particulièrement fréquent chez ceux souffrant de problèmes de santé mentale (

runs.text: Almost a quarter of employees who went on extended sick leave due to a lack of appropriate accommodation were away for more than six months (
runs.french_text: Presque un quart des employés qui ont pris une longue période de maladie en raison d'un manque d'habitation adaptée étaient absents pendant plus de six mois (

paragraphs.text: Less than one in five employees who went on extended sick leave are satisfied with the level of support or accommodation they received when they returned, leaving open the possibility they may need to take leave again in the future (slide 35).

runs.text: Less than one in five employees who went on extended sick leave are satisfied with the level of support or accommodation they received when they returned, leaving open the possibility they may need to take leave again in the future (
runs.french_text: Moins d'un sur cinq des employés ayant pris une longue pause maladie sont satisfaits du niveau d'appui ou d'accommodement reçu lors de leur retour, laissant ouverte la possibilité qu'ils puissent de nouveau prendre des congés à l'avenir.

paragraphs.text: Many employees who have taken extended leave say it could have been avoided if they had been properly accommodated (slide 36).

runs.text: Many employees who have taken extended leave say it could have been avoided if they had been properly accommodated (
runs.french_text: De nombreux employés qui ont pris une longue période d'absence disent qu'elle aurait pu être évitée s'ils avaient été correctement accommodés.

paragraphs.text: What did we learn? What can we explore further?

runs.french_text: Qu'est-ce que nous pouvons explorer davantage ?

paragraphs.text: Employees’ view about their future career prospects in the Government of Canada are connected to their experience with the accommodation process.

runs.french_text: Point de vue des employés sur leur

runs.text: in the Government of Canada are connected to their experience with the accommodation process.
runs.french_text: Dans le gouvernement du Canada, ils sont connectés à leur expérience avec le processus d'accueil.

paragraphs.text: Four in ten employees are negative about their career prospects over the next five years. They cite concerns about being viewed as a poor candidate in the selection process or that moving positions would mean re-requesting (and possibly jeopardizing) their accommodation (slide 30).

runs.text: Four in ten employees are negative about their career prospects over the next five years. They cite concerns about being viewed as a poor candidate in the selection process or that moving positions would mean re-requesting (and possibly jeopardizing) their accommodation (
runs.french_text: Quatre sur dix employés sont négatifs quant à leurs perspectives de carrière au cours des cinq prochaines années. Ils mentionnent des préoccupations liées à l'idée d'être perçus comme un mauvais candidat lors du processus de sélection ou à l'idée que le changement de poste entraînerait une nouvelle demande (et potentiellement un risque) d'accommodement.

paragraphs.text: Many (49%) report having opted out of a staffing process because of barriers related to their health condition or disability, a substantial number (41%) feel they have been denied a promotional opportunity due to reasons related to their condition or disability, and more than half (54%) feel underemployed or not challenged enough (slide 29).

runs.text: Many (49%) report having opted out of a staffing process because of barriers related to their health condition or disability, a substantial number (41%) feel they have been denied a promotional opportunity due to reasons related to their condition or disability, and more than half (54%) feel underemployed or not challenged enough (
runs.french_text: Plusieurs (49 %) rapportent avoir opté pour un processus de recrutement en raison d'obstacles liés à leur état de santé ou à leur handicap, un nombre considérable (41 %) se sentent avoir été exclus d'une opportunité de promotion en raison de raisons liées à leur état ou à leur handicap, et plus de la moitié (54 %) se sentent sous-employés ou insuff

paragraphs.text: Optimism about their federal government career is strongest among employees with an approved accommodation fully in place (slide 29).

runs.text: Optimism about their federal government career is strongest among employees with an approved accommodation fully in place (
runs.french_text: L'optimisme concernant leur carrière au sein du gouvernement fédéral est le plus fort chez les employés dont une accommodation approuvée est pleinement en place (

paragraphs.text: There is some evidence that employees with conditions or disabilities that are more readily recognizable to outside observers, such as seeing, flexibility/dexterity and mobility disabilities, tend to have more successful accommodation experiences.

runs.text: There is some evidence that employees with
runs.french_text: Il existe certains éléments de preuve indiquant que les employés ayant

runs.text: conditions or disabilities that are more readily recognizable
runs.french_text: conditions ou handicaps plus facilement reconnaissables

runs.text: to outside observers, such as seeing, flexibility/dexterity and mobility disabilities, tend to have
runs.french_text: aux observateurs externes, tels que la vue, les troubles de la flexibilité/dextérité et les troubles de la mobilité, tendent à avoir

paragraphs.text: It is unclear whether increased evidence requirements and/or increased complexity in the assessment process contributes to the more negative experiences reported by employees with conditions or disabilities that are less easily recognizable to outside observers.

runs.text: It is unclear whether increased evidence requirements and/or increased complexity in the assessment process contributes to the
runs.french_text: Il est unclear si les exigences accrues de preuve et/ou la complexité accrue dans le processus d'évaluation contribuent à l'

runs.text: more negative experiences reported by employees with conditions or disabilities that are less easily recognizable
runs.french_text: plus d'expériences négatives rapportées par les employés dont les conditions ou handicaps sont moins facilement reconnaissables

paragraphs.text: Employees with seeing, flexibility/dexterity and mobility-related disabilities are more likely to have their accommodation request approved (slide 21), are more satisfied with the process overall and have the most positive views about their career prospects.

runs.text: Employees with seeing, flexibility/dexterity and mobility-related disabilities are more likely to have their accommodation request approved (
runs.french_text: Les employés ayant des handicaps liés à la vision, à la flexibilité/dextérité ou à la mobilité ont plus de chances de voir leur demande de mise en place d'accommodements approuvée.

runs.text: ), are more satisfied with the process overall and have the most positive views about their career prospects.
runs.french_text: ), sont plus satisfaits du processus dans son ensemble et ont les plus bonnes perspectives concernant leur avenir professionnel.

paragraphs.text: Those whose conditions or disabilities are less easily recognizable to outside observers, such as mental health issues and sensory / environmental disabilities, are more likely to be dissatisfied with the accommodation process, and employees who have mental health issues are the least likely to have their request approved (slide 21).

runs.text: Those whose conditions or disabilities are less easily recognizable to outside observers, such as mental health issues and sensory / environmental disabilities, are more likely to be dissatisfied with the accommodation process, and employees who have mental health issues are the least likely to have their request approved (
runs.french_text: Ceux dont les conditions ou handicaps sont moins facilement reconnaissables aux observateurs externes, tels que les problèmes de santé mentale et les handicaps sensoriels/environnementaux, sont plus enclins à être insatisfaits du processus d'accommodement, et les employés souffrant de problèmes de santé mentale sont les moins susceptibles de voir leur demande approuvée.

paragraphs.text: More than half of supervisors agree that invisible conditions make the assessment process more complex, mainly due to the need for additional evidence and/or formal assessment by an external doctor or specialist, and assessments not calibrated to the circumstances of the accommodation request (slides 16, 17 and 26).

runs.text: More than half of supervisors agree that invisible conditions make the assessment process more complex, mainly due to the need for additional evidence and/or formal assessment by an external doctor or specialist, and assessments not calibrated to the circumstances of the accommodation request (slides
runs.french_text: Plus de la moitié des superviseurs sont d'accord pour dire que les conditions invisibles rendent le processus d'évaluation plus complexe, principalement en raison du besoin de preuves supplémentaires et/ou d'une évaluation formelle par un médecin ou un spécialiste externe, ainsi que d'évaluations non adaptées aux circonstances de la demande d'accommodation (diapositives
